settings.title: Settings
settings.profilePictureTooltip: This image will be displayed as your admin avatar in the chat section of the app

infoAlert.title: Push Notification Configuration
infoAlert.description: These settings control when you receive push notifications on your device. Changes are applied immediately.

description.paragraph1: Push notifications help you stay informed about important activities in your app without constantly checking the dashboard. You'll receive real-time alerts for the events you choose below.
description.paragraph2: Configure which user actions should trigger push notifications to your device. You can enable or disable each notification type based on your preferences and workflow needs.

userMessages.title: User Messages
userMessages.description: Receive notifications when users send you messages in the chat

userCompletedCheck.title: User Completed Check
userCompletedCheck.description: Get notified when users complete their scheduled body measurements and progress checks

userUpdatedCheck.title: User Updated Check
userUpdatedCheck.description: Receive alerts when users modify or update their existing check data

userCompletedExercise.title: User Completed Exercise
userCompletedExercise.description: Get notified when users finish individual exercises during their workouts

userCompletedTrainingProgram.title: User Completed Training Program
userCompletedTrainingProgram.description: Receive notifications when users complete entire training programs or workout sessions

userCompletedProfile.title: New User Completed Profile
userCompletedProfile.description: Get notified when new users finish setting up their complete profile information

userPurchasedSubscription.title: User Purchased Subscription
userPurchasedSubscription.description: Receive alerts when users purchase or renew their subscription plans

userBookedExtraCall.title: User Booked Extra Call
userBookedExtraCall.description: Get notified when users book additional call sessions outside their regular plan

userBookedSupplementaryCall.title: User Booked Supplementary Call
userBookedSupplementaryCall.description: Receive alerts when users schedule supplementary consultation calls

globalConfig.title: Global Configurations
globalConfig.checkEditWindowDescription: Number of hours during which a user can edit a check after creation
globalConfig.checkReminderDaysDescription: Number of days before the next scheduled check to send reminder notifications to users
